name: Abandoned Hospital VR
description: You have to escape from this insane place. Oculus Rift required to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space
